keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.UCS

Class RNichedMutation

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.UCS.RNichedMutation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RealMutation

    public class RNichedMutation
extends java.lang.Object
implements RealMutation

    This class performs the niched mutation. The changes made in the classifier cannot result in another classifier that does not match with the environment (we can change a don't care for the value of the parent, or a value for a don't care value, but, for example, we would never change a '0' for a '1').

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Albert Orriols (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 03/12/2008
